meanings.definition: To make known publicly or officially
meanings.sent1: The teacher announced the winner of the spelling bee to the whole class.
meanings.sent2: The mayor announced the new city park opening date to the citizens.
meanings.sent3: The parrot announced the arrival of guests by squawking loudly.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun announced the start of a new day with its warm rays.
meanings.sent5: The ringing bell announced the end of the school day, much to the students' delight.

meanings.sent2: The president announced a national holiday for the following week.
meanings.sent3: The cat announced its ownership of the house by leaving paw prints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm announced its arrival with loud claps of thunder.
meanings.sent5: The town crier announced the news of the royal wedding with great enthusiasm.
